entry.title: $1850 // Astoria 1bd with backyard
entry.content:
Landlord's son helping rent a Beautiful and super spacious 1 bdr apartment off of the booming Ditmars Boulevard stop in Astoria. A little bit off of the main strip where there are dozens of bars and restaurants (live music/trivia night galore) so you can have quiet when you want it and fun when you don't. 650 sq feet (not inclusive of large backyard)
Brand New appliances. 11' ceilings in a large living room with hardwood floors and new tiling and cabinets in the kitchen. Wonderful details throughout the apartment such as area designed to be a home bar. Apartment complete with almost completely private backyard shared with another apartment that doesn't use it (but you have your private half. Apartment can come partly furnished if you'd like to keep them.
Proof of credit/income needed.
Email me for more information. Having viewings tomorrow and a few other days this week. email me for an appointment.
February 1st move in
10 minute walk to the train
